overview:
Susan MacTavish Best has worked extensively with European and North American companies providing them with strategic public relations counsel. She started Best Public Relations in 1998 and has partnered with a diverse portfolio of clients during this time including craigslist, Esurance, LaLa, Lulu, Playfish, Smugmug, MainStreet.com, and Olivia Cruises and Resorts.

In 2012, Susan launched Living MacTavish, a lifestyle website focusing on food and drink, fashion, design and living.

Susan sits on the advisory board of the Berkeley Center for New Media at UC Berkeley as well as the advisory board of the Diabetes and Wellness Foundation, a national non-profit that helps diabetics lead healthy lives. Susan is also on the advisory board of a handful of startups.

Susan is on the external advisory board of the Yale School of Nursing.

Susan is an Executive Producer of craigslistTV. http://www.youtube.com/craigslist

A single-malt and haggis fan, Susan grew up in St. Andrews, Scotland though you wouldn’t know it from her accent. During off hours, Susan can be found running slowly but deliberately on Mt. Tamalpais or cooking up a storm for friends.
